```markdown
# Extendicare Emergency Preparedness## Colour Codes| Colour  | Description                     |
|---------|---------------------------------|
| Red     | Fire                            |
| Blue    | Medical Emergency               |
| White   | Violent Situation               |
| Orange  | External Disaster               |
| Black   | Bomb Threat                     |
| Green   | Evacuation                      |
| Yellow  | Missing Resident                |
| Grey    |                                 |
| Brown   | Hazardous/Chemical Spill       |
| Silver  | Active Assailant                |
| Purple  | Hostage Situation               |## ... helping people live better
```
